The holidays are fast approaching and you don't want to get another pair of plain white sports socks for Christmas, do you?

Whether you're trying to find a gift for that music lover and P&P reader in your life or you just want to buy yourself something cool this holiday, we've got you covered with our Holiday Gift Guide. All 20 of these items, from the Saint Kanye candle to the Wu-Tang x Huf jersey to the MF DOOM ring, are 100% Pigeons & Planes approved and will increase your quality of life exponentially. Trust us.

Oh, and if you wanted to give your favorite pigeons a little gift this Christmas... well... read on.
